## IConnectionChecker interface

Class for connection type checking logic.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IConnectionChecker 
```

<tr><td>

[doSafetyChecks(a, b)](./blockly.iconnectionchecker_interface.dosafetychecks_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Check that connecting the given connections is safe, meaning that it would not break any of Blockly's basic assumptions (e.g. no self connections).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[doTypeChecks(a, b)](./blockly.iconnectionchecker_interface.dotypechecks_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Check whether this connection is compatible with another connection with respect to the value type system. E.g. square\_root("Hello") is not compatible.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getErrorMessage(errorCode, a, b)](./blockly.iconnectionchecker_interface.geterrormessage_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Helper method that translates a connection error code into a string.
